import React, { useState } from "react"; import EditUser from "./EditUser"; const UserInformationTable = ({ users, onDelete, onUpdate }) => { // State to manage selected role for each user const [selectedRoles, setSelectedRoles] = useState({}); // Handler for role change const handleRoleChange = (userId, role) => { setSelectedRoles(prevRoles => ({ ...prevRoles, [userId]: role })); }; return (

User Information

{index + 1} {user.name} {user.email} {user.role}

); }; export default UserInformationTable;
